item.description:
Appetizers, Cocktails & Entertainment at Oceans Restaurant

Oceans serves appetizers, burgers, pizza and seafood.

We'll grab a bite to eat and then get your dancing shoes on or kick them off for it is always a hell of a time with entertainment from Livin Las Vegas!

#1. Livin' Las Vegas is is a dynamic duo, Miami Mike Marnier and Little Eddie Chivas who team up as Livin' Las Vegas. The duo re-creates the feel of a '60s lounge act, but adds hits by Billy Joel and Harry Connick Jr. with hits from the 70s, & 80 and with much, much more! Phenomenal Entertainers!

NOTE: Valet Parking Only. . .

Ocean's Restaurant used to be Steamers. Presently the Angler's Club is on the top floor, but the Restaurant is on the bottom. Down near the docks. Located across the street from where the ferries leave.

Show starts at 8:00 so get there early so we can get a seat for they always pack the house!
item.how_to_find_us: Look for the crazy blonde with the red sundress on!

group.name: "Girls Just Wanna Have Fun!" Women Social Meetup Group

item.name: Appetizers, Cocktails & Entertainment by "Livin' Las Vegas" at Oceans Restaurant
